column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday September 13 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd at Jingle Bell Ln:
column4: A lightning strike damaged an electric pole and resulted in downed wires.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd at Jingle Bell Ln:
column4: The outer loop is down to one lane with traffic diverted to the left turn lane until further notice.
